text: @FLOTUS @WhiteHouse @POTUS Dozens of Secret Service officers and agents on site for Trump's Tulsa rally have been ordered to self-quarantine after two of their colleagues tested positive for coronavirus⁠—part of the fallout from Trump's insistence on the event. https://t.co/6KqFU6XH59
